reviews.review_msg: assignments are easy and worth a good portion of your grade however fina and midterm are tough and you need to memerize all processes in textbook. prof was super nice tho and made lectures/online videos intresting. mc quizzes in tutorial every two weeks were hard but not worth much. i would take this course if you need a science/bpk.

Diana had very engaging lectures, and the concepts of the class were interesting and fun to learn. Unfortunately, the tests did not at all encompass what we learned in class. She would test on minor details found in the textbook that were not covered in lecture or mentioned at all throughout the course. She constantly changed deadlines as well.

Amazing prof. Breaks things down in lectures to make it clear for all knowledge levels. Lectures are very well made and engaging. It's clear she has passion for the subject and teaching about it. Very interesting assignments and lessons you'll remember going forward in life even if you aren't pursuing kinesiology. 10/10 would take again.

Never replies to any email. Her videos are ok, but for the midterm and final online, it takes almost an hour to check IDs as it isn't an open book, and you have to be on camera the whole time. Worst experience ever. The videos and slides aren't enough, so get the textbook. She's not very considerate either.

She is so passionate and inspirational I would reccomend this class to anyone. Its a science.. you need to study! Memorizing is a big part of it but also understanding the material. Tests were fair and she gives you assignments that help boost your grade if you dont test so well. Overall amazing prof
so nice and understanding, and takes time for each student regardless of how busy she is!
